name: SMPTETime
desc: Specifies a time stamp as one of the SMPTE time types.

items.name: init(mSubframes: Int16, mSubframeDivisor: Int16, mCounter: UInt32, mType: SMPTETimeType, mFlags: SMPTETimeFlags, mHours: Int16, mMinutes: Int16, mSeconds: Int16, mFrames: Int16)
var mCounter: UInt32
items.desc: The total number of messages received. It takes 8 messages to carry a full SMPTE time code.

items.name: var mFlags: SMPTETimeFlags
items.desc: A set of flags that indicate the SMPTE state (see SMPTE State Flags).

items.name: var mFrames: Int16
items.desc: The value of the frames portion of the SMPTE time.

items.name: var mHours: Int16
items.desc: The value of the hours portion of the SMPTE time.

items.name: var mMinutes: Int16
items.desc: The value of the minutes portion of the SMPTE time.

items.name: var mSeconds: Int16
items.desc: The value of the seconds portion of the SMPTE time.

items.name: var mSubframeDivisor: Int16
items.desc: The number of subframes per video frame (typically 80).

items.name: var mSubframes: Int16
items.desc: A subframe offset to the HH:MM:SS:FF time. You can use this field to position a time marker somewhere within the time span represented by a video frame, if necessary.

items.name: var mType: SMPTETimeType
items.desc: A SMPTE time type constant indicating the kind of SMPTE time used (see SMPTE Timecode Type Constants).
